title: Perform a Lien Search
description: As part of a real estate transaction, a paralegal needs to perform a search to see if there are any outstanding liens on the property.

tasks.description: Identify the property by its address and parcel number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct property identifiers.

tasks.description: Search the county recorder's office online database for any recorded liens against the property.
Search the Secretary of State's UCC filing database for any liens against the property owner.
Compile a report of any found liens for the attorney to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a summary of all discovered encumbrances.
